modName: Male Female Human player nude only
summary: If you don't like seeing other male NPC being naked with female NPC naked, this mod will make you the player be the only one naked.  Both male and female player are supported.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff7700][size=3]!!!! WARNING !!!! Male player nude erect version![/size][/color]

[color=#ffff00][size=3]Backing up your saves is always a good step before trying out any mod.[/size][/color]

I didn't like seeing other male NPC being naked with female NPC naked in my own house, so I created this mod to make only my player be naked. See the pic for Gwendolyn female NPC in bed naked with a guard in my own house.

The v2 will isolate both body and face appearance, and the werewolf mode works. The v2 uses the new NordPlayerRace mode to isolate, and the body appearance works with a save load. For the face replace, follow these steps:
1. Replace .nif and .dds file to your own for body and head.
2. Load a save, and do showracemenu. Doing new game should also work.
3. You should be at NordPlayerRace with loading a save.
4. Move to Body by RT. Switch sex and back to original to see your appearance
5. Both male and female first preset have this mod's .nif and .dds file usage.
For body, you don't need these steps. You'll see the nude appearance soon after you load a save.

This mod includes the "Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces" mod erect version. I only use his body, feet and hands. Please endorse his mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488

I added the Female player nude using CBBE. If you want to use UNP, just replace the nif files and dds files.

[color=#00ffff][size=3]=== Uninstall Steps ===
[/size][/color]If you want to uninstall this mod, you'll need to use the "showracemenu" option to pick the game vanilla race.
[list=1][*]Load the save you want to uninstall.[/*]
[*]Hit the tilde "~" key to bring up the game console window.[/*]
[*]Type showracemenu, and hit the tilde key again to lower the console window.[/*]
[*]You'll see this mod has pre-selected the "NordPlayer" race.[/*]
[*]Select the other game vanilla race such as the Nord race.[/*]
[*]Hit Done "R" key. Once done, save the game.[/*]
[*]Exit the game, and remove this mod.[/*]
[*]Start Skyrim, and load the save you just saved.
[/*]
[/list]
=== Still see all NPC male/female nude ===
This mod used the BSA file to allow you to override this mod's mesh file and the texture file. If you have installed a male nude mod that put the malebody mesh files to the Skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/character/character assets directory, that mod will override this mod and will see all male NPC nude. This would happen also with the female option if you see the nude femalebody mesh files in that directory. You would need to either uninstall that mod (recommended method), or delete those nude mesh files. If still see NPC nude, please try put this mod's Skysan_PlayerSkin.esp file as the last in the mod order.

If you still see all NPC nude, please try the optional body mesh files. This has the game default vanilla body mesh files for a particular body gender, so please pick one to match the MAIN download gender choice. If you have a body mod install for that body gender, you should remove it before installing this mod.

Thanks to:
Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by Chris57 and FavoredSoul
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente
Fair Skin Complexion Sweaty Body-ADEC-CBBE-UNP-UNPB by HHaleyy
RANs HeadMesh Variants by RAN46
author: Skysan4298
